amendment.description: Amendment provides for the establishment of the National Priority Project designation, which shall be evidenced by a medal bearing the inscription "National Priority Project" which shall be presented to organizations to recognize advancement in the the field of renewable energy technology.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 109-49 to establish an annual award for organizations that have advanced the field of renewable energy technology.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walsh amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
